statements: SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' AND description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY deadline DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY task_id ASC
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31' AND priority < 2 ORDER BY priority ASC, deadline DESC
SELECT task_id, task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' AND (priority = 1 OR priority = 3)
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE category_id = 'abc123';
SELECT task_name FROM tasks WHERE deadline < NOW();
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE priority > 1 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, description, deadline, priority FROM tasks WHERE priority > 3
SELECT task_id, task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE deadline < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY priority DESC
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Important%' AND description IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM tasks JOIN categories ON tasks.task_id = categories.category_id
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE priority = (SELECT MAX(priority) FROM tasks)
SELECT task_id, task_name, description FROM task_details;
SELECT task_name, deadline, priority FROM task_details WHERE deadline > '2021-09-15';
SELECT * FROM task_details WHERE priority = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, priority FROM task_details ORDER BY priority DESC;
SELECT assignee_name, assignee_email FROM task_assignees WHERE task_id = 5;
SELECT task_name, description FROM task_details WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assignee_name FROM task_details JOIN task_assignees ON task_details.task_id = task_assignees.task_id WHERE assignee_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM task_details WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT task_name, assignee_email FROM task_details JOIN task_assignees ON task_details.task_id = task_assignees.task_id WHERE priority <= 2;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(task_id) AS tasks_count FROM task_categories JOIN task_details ON task_categories.category_id = task_details.task_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY tasks_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE priority = 1;
SELECT task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-06-30';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, category_name FROM tasks JOIN task_categories ON tasks.task_id = task_categories.task_id JOIN categories ON task_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT task_name, deadline, priority FROM tasks WHERE deadline IS NOT NULL AND priority >= 2;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE priority > 5 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, description FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%important%' AND deadline < NOW();
SELECT t.task_name, c.category_name, t.deadline FROM tasks t JOIN task_categories tc ON t.task_id = tc.task_id JOIN categories c ON tc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT t.task_name, COUNT(assignee_id) as num_assignees FROM tasks t LEFT JOIN task_assignees ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id GROUP BY t.task_name;

SELECT task_id, task_name, priority, deadline FROM tasks WHERE priority >= 3 AND task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM task_categories WHERE category_id = '1234-5678-9012-3456') ORDER BY priority DESC, deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, priority FROM tasks WHERE priority = 'High';
SELECT task_name, description, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, username FROM tasks JOIN task_assignments ON tasks.task_id = task_assignments.task_id;
SELECT task_id, task_name, history_id FROM tasks JOIN task_history ON tasks.task_id = task_history.task_id ORDER BY history_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE priority = 'High';

SELECT assignment_id, username, task_name, assignment_date FROM task_assignments JOIN users ON task_assignments.user_id = users.user_id JOIN tasks ON task_assignments.task_id = tasks.task_id ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, COUNT(comment_id) AS comment_count FROM tasks LEFT JOIN task_comments ON tasks.task_id = task_comments.task_id GROUP BY task_id ORDER BY comment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_history WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY action_date DESC LIMIT 5;
